data.message: I was contact by Jackson Floyd who say he from Facebook management and I had won money. Wanted my personal information. Is it a scam

replies.message: Hey Judy. Thanks for checking in with us. This campaign is a known hoax. If you see content like this on Facebook, please report it to us as spam by using these tips from our Help Center: https://www.facebook.com/help/205730929485170 -Hailey

someone put a large ad right in the middle 0f my page.Even the star o,  this documentary, (     )   . When he left he just shrugged  crossed his fingers,I could reverse this buy they would let  pay the fee  for the technicion to fix it!  Yesterday all of my passwords are gone so I,vebeen working on that!!

Just couple weeks ago, an intruder access a friend's of mine page..he's a singer..she posted a silly comment such, "I want to see your smile, as I have, my friend whoever is the thief name, lend me $30,000, and she sent that person e mail address.  I warned my friend and everyone to be careful because the message was a fraudulent action trying to get a personal information...Of course, I sent a message to that intruder and I warned her that her message was forwarded to the Attorney General. We must be careful and do not believe any stupid message.  The best thing is to report it to Facebook, and our Attorney General, because they can investigate and caught  the intruders.
